column1: eroticfriendfictions 139490535121 "2016-02-17 16:55:49 GMT" https://eroticfriendfictions.tumblr.com/post/139490535121/behind-bobs-burgers-da-ding-ding-music-video "allnaps:This is from a while back
column2: but I guess it’s up on Youtube now! Just want to mention that this was a huge labor of love. It was all done in-house and we were given pretty much complete creative freedom in making this. The team was led by Kat (who basically created the concept and directed the whole thing) and animated by Kat
column5: and myself. I did Tina’s animation (I cringe looking back at it now :-/) and Rat in a Hat. It challenged me as an animator and was also loads of fun. Great times were had. ANYWAY
column6: this video holds a special place in my heart and now it can hold a special place in your browser history
